mapper.select: select F_Number, MyFeed, ID, F_Time, F_Group from Feed where F_Group = 'Feed' order by F_Number desc limit 10
select C_Number, C_Group, N_Title, URL from Crawler where C_Group = 'News' order by C_Number desc limit 10
select C_Number, C_Group, S_Content, S_User from Crawler where C_Group = 'SNS' order by C_Number desc limit 10
